title: Onedotzero logo?
content:
Hello everyone.   
   
Just curious if anyone has any idea what typeface the **onedotzero** logo is set in?! Apparently the same typeface has a "stencil" version as well...   
   
 ![onedotzero logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053058im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48310.gif)   
   
For more applications:   
 [http://www.onedotzero.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053058/http:/www.onedotzero.com/)   
 [http://www.onedotzero.jp](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053058/http:/www.onedotzero.jp/)   
   
   
Thanx in advance...
author: restate

comments.content:
Looks like ' [Gridnik](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053058/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry_gridnik/gridnik.html)', from [The Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053058/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/)..   
( Edit.: Maybe the stencil version is hand made / custom made.. )

danke schï¿½n... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053058im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
indeed, it looks very similar.   
the "r" is slightly different, but then again, insignificantly different.

Bitteschoen.. Youre welcome.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053058im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
_( Maybe the 'r' has just been customized and 'cutted', too.. )_
